home.welcomeText: Vibe Coding: Building an MVP using Low-Code AI App Builders
home.description: A hands-on workshop to help you quickly build and deploy AI-powered applications without extensive coding.

promptExamples.label: Product Manager Prompt
promptExamples.content:
You are a highly experienced Prompt Engineer. Please improve my prompt below.

Prompt:
Role: You are a highly experienced Product Manager.
Goal: Create an MVP that helps us learn [Anticipated Learning]
Task: Using the MVP description below, create a set of requirements my coding assistant can use to create this app. Keep the app as simple as possible while still achieving our goal. 

MVP description: 
[A short description of the site including functionality, fields, and any other requirements]

promptExamples.label: Software Developer Prompt
promptExamples.content:
You are a highly experienced Prompt Engineer. Please improve my prompt below.

Prompt:
Role: You are a highly experienced Software Developer
Goal: Create an MVP that helps us learn [Anticipated Learning].
Task: Create an app that meets the requirements below.  Keep the app as simple as possible while still achieving our goal. 

Requirements:
[Paste requirements here]
